articles.author: Filip Cleeren
articles.title: Verstappen: Red Bull "severely off the pace" in Imola F1 practice - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Max Verstappen says Red Bull is "severely off the pace" for Formula 1's Emilia Romagna Grand Prix after struggling with his car handling in Imola on Friday.
articles.content:
Verstappen's frustration boiled over throughout both practice sessions as his upgraded Red Bull RB20 proved hard to control on the technical Italian venue's second sector.
The triple world champion … [+1878 chars]

articles.title: 2024 F1 Emilia Romagna Grand Prix - Free Practice 1 results - Racingnews365.com
articles.description: Check out the full results from Free Practice 1 ahead of the 2024 F1 Emilia Romagna Grand Prix from Imola.
articles.content:
Charles Leclerc emerged fastest from a red-flagged Free Practice 1 ahead of the Emilia Romagna Grand Prix at Imola.
Leclerc pumped in a 1:16.990 on the softest C5 tyres to pip Mercedes' George Russe… [+439 chars]
